DOC.brief_summary: Participants initially assess suitability inclusion study undergo physical screening affect shoulder cervical spine experience physiotherapist . After , participant attend 72 hour data record baseline measure ( range motion goniometer , pressure pain threshold algometer , peak force dynamometer ) four session per week 24 hour interval session . At experimental week session , participant receive one two treatment condition ( MWM sham ) repeat assessment . In follow week , crossover condition individual 24 hour last treatment session , examiner last assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Mulligan 's Technique Subjects With Shoulder Impingement Syndrome
DOC.criteria: history shoulder pain > 1week duration , localize proximal anterolateral shoulder region consistent Shoulder Impingement Syndrome ( SIS ) ; least 1 positive impingement test ( Jobe 's test , Neer 's test , HawkinsKennedy 's Test ) associate painful range motion arm elevation ; pain external rotation arm 90 degree elevation coronal plane . fibromyalgia ( base selfreport ) , pregnancy , history onset symptom traumatic injury , history shoulder injury , torn tendon , ligamentous laxity base positive Sulcus test apprehension test , numbness tingle upper extremity , previous shoulder neck surgery , systemic illness , body mass index > 28kg/m2 , corticosteroid injection 3 month evaluation , physical therapy 3 month evaluation .
